name: The Conquest (Avramov Denis)
description:
The Conquest is a classic turn-based strategy game that combines strategy on the global map and tactical battles on the battle map. Three directions of development of cities will allow the player make strategic decisions on economic development, defense or attack on the global map, the balance between which will largely determine the success of each party. And eight types of units with unique features will make it possible to collect units that are best suited to implement various tactics of combat. The absence of unnecessary role-playing companions will appeal to true connoisseurs of turn-based strategies and allows you to focus on the concise mechanics of the game.

Peculiar properties:

- Map of 40 cities will allow plenty to enjoy the game, which will not have time to tire;

- Game for 6 players, you can play with the computer and with friends (hot seat);

- 3 types of strategic buildings and 8 unique types of units will help to diversify the style of game;

- Ease of development and absence of role-playing elements will ensure rapid entry into the game without long learning and reading multi-volume manuals.
